heroSection.title_h1: Legal Solution for Economic Insolvency | ATTLAS

solutionsSection.title_h1: SOLUTIONS AND BENEFITS DESIGNED FOR YOU
solutionsSection.description_p: Financial insolvency is not a crime; it's a reality that can affect anyone. At ATTLAS, we protect your right to dignity, equality, and financial justice, in accordance with the principles of International Human Rights. Because starting over is not a privilege; it's a fundamental right.

feature1.title: Free Consultation
feature1.description: Register and receive your first consultation at no cost.

feature2.title: Conciliation Center
feature2.description: Conciliation center for economic insolvency and debt negotiation.

feature3.title: B-Learning Education Center
feature3.description: B-Learning platform for a new personal and financial beginning.

feature4.title: Social Impact
feature4.description: Pro-bono and volunteer work for people in vulnerable situations.

solutionsSection.onu_desa:
The Attlas Org Foundation, REGISTERED in the database of the United Nations Department of Economic and Social Affairs (UN DESA - ONU), promotes the project "Colombia Debt Relief: A New Beginning", an initiative supported by the law firm Propensiones Internacional.

This program represents an innovative model of economic justice, designed to strengthen asset recovery and financial stability for vulnerable sectors through advanced legal mechanisms and specialized financial strategies. Based on the principles of international cooperation and sustainable development, this project not only seeks to alleviate the economic burdens of thousands of families, but also to establish a legal framework that guarantees their social inclusion and long-term stability.

whyUsSection.description_p: We defend financial justice with dignity, recognizing that financial insolvency is not a crime, but a reality that anyone can face. We are committed to providing fair solutions, without discrimination or stigma, supporting the human right to a new beginning. Grounded in the principles of International Human Rights, ATTLAS protects equality and financial justice, ensuring that every person can regain their financial footing with support and respect.

metaData.title: Legal Solution to Your Debts - Debt Restructuring | ATTLAS
metaData.description: At ATTLAS, we help you restructure your debts, suspend garnishments, and protect yourself legally. Receive free advice and settle your debts with the highest discounts. Contact us via WhatsApp!

requirementsSection.description_p: We offer multiple benefits and guarantees for individuals and companies facing financial difficulties.

feature1.title: Who does it apply to?
feature1.description:
â€¢ Natural Persons
â€¢ Merchants
â€¢ Workers and Employers
â€¢ Families
â€¢ Property Owners and Tenants
â€¢ Public and Private Entities
â€¢ Debtors and Creditors
â€¢ Victims of Rights Violations
â€¢ Community and Social Organizations
â€¢ People in a Situation of Insolvency

feature2.title: Requirements
feature2.description:
â€¢ Valid identification
â€¢ Formal conciliation request
â€¢ Legitimate interest in the conflict
â€¢ Matter subject to conciliation according to law
â€¢ Willingness of the parties to conciliate
â€¢ Payment of fees (if applicable)
â€¢ Documentary support of the case
â€¢ Legal representation (if applicable)
â€¢ Updated contact information
â€¢ Authorization for data processing

feature3.title: Main Guarantees
feature3.description:
â€¢ Impartiality and Neutrality
â€¢ Confidentiality of the Process
â€¢ Access to Justice
â€¢ Respect for Fundamental Rights
â€¢ Legality and Legal Certainty
â€¢ Voluntariness of the Parties
â€¢ Efficiency and Procedural Speed
â€¢ Equity in the Agreements
â€¢ Recognition of Human Rights
â€¢ Transparency in Management

feature4.title: Budgets
feature4.description:
â€¢ Quick and effective conflict resolution
â€¢ Reduced legal costs
â€¢ Confidentiality and information protection
â€¢ Equitable access to justice
â€¢ Avoid prolonged legal proceedings
â€¢ Encourages dialogue and cooperation
â€¢ Legal certainty in reached agreements
â€¢ Protection of fundamental and human rights
â€¢ Flexibility in dispute resolution
â€¢ Restoration of relationships between the parties
